raw: With the highest number of coronavirus infections in Southeast Asia , Malaysia is banning citizens from travelling overseas and visitors from entering the country from midnight until March 31 to help stop the spread of the disease .

raw: But many of the 300,000 Malaysians who commute daily to Singapore were caught off guard by Monday night ’s announcement , which could have left them without a salary for the duration of the ban .
